description: The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, today urged the Gems and Jewellery sector in India to look beyond the domestic market and establish a global presence. Speaking at a felicitation function org
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Discussed the ample scope for growth in jewellery sector at the felicitation programme organised by All India Gems & Jewellers Federation. 

Assured jeweller friends that Central Government will always remain sensitive to their concerns & will always support them in their growth. Urged jewellers to embrace modern technology & focus on the global market in addition to catering to local needs. 
http://nm-4.com/ogbt
